content: 140 x 142cm/55 x 56 inch west yorkshire spinners the croft aran 182 yards/166m 3 5 oz/100g a stanydale 1011 \ green 6 balls b reawick 1010 \ red 4 balls c sullom 010 \ white 5 balls one pair of 5mm uk6/us8 knitting needles one 5mm uk6/us8 circular knitting needle 100cm long one pair of 4mm uk8/us6 knitting needles one 4mm uk8/us6 circular knitting needle 100cm long gauge 18 sts and 24 row to 10cm/4in over stocking stitch
